description.raw:
The upstream ABI checker script has a parsing error on xenial:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/88/console

~~~
+ abi-compliance-checker -lib gazebo -old pkg.xml -new devel.xml
syntax error at /usr/bin/abi-compliance-checker line 819, near ""\n\n";"
Execution of /usr/bin/abi-compliance-checker aborted due to compilation errors.
~~~

It was introduced recently onto the master branch:

* https://github.com/lvc/abi-compliance-checker/commit/26742a8c630e5dd42838a8c2faf4bb4f8e59c393

The workaround is to checkout a tag instead of using the master branch.

title.raw: Use abi-compliance-checker tag instead of master
